text: aur goya hamane (khuda) bahutere jinnaat aur aadamiyon ko jahannum ke vaaste paida kiya aur unake dil to hain (magar kasadan) un se dekhate hee nahin aur unake kaan bhee hai (magar) unase sunane ka kaam hee nahin lete (khulaasa) ye log goya jaanavar hain balki unase bhee kaheen gae guzare hue yahee log (amoor haq) se bilkul bekhabar hain
